channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow industrials lose ground Friday en route to worst week since October
What to make of Amazon’s and Meta’s donations to the Trump inauguration
Why Nvidia is sitting out the chip-stock rally following Broadcom’s earnings
Trump taps Truth Social CEO to lead intelligence advisory board
item.description: Trump said Nunes will remain the chief executive of Truth Social while leading the advisory panel.

item.title: Forget about the 4% rule for retirement withdrawals and think 3.7% instead
Trump and members of Congress want drones shot down while more are spotted near military facilities
item.description: The Pentagon said that the military’s initial assessment — that the drones are not of foreign origin — remains unchanged.

item.title: ABC agrees to give $15 million to Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle defamation lawsuit
item.description: ABC will also pay $1 million in legal fees to Trump’s lawyer.

item.title: A Fed rate cut next week could make the conclusion of a rate-cycle phase
Nancy Pelosi has hip replacement surgery at a US military hospital in Germany after falling at Battle of the Bulge ceremony
item.description: Pelosi, 84, “is well on the mend,” said Ian Krager, a spokesman for the California Democrat, in a statement.

item.title: The fall of Afghanistan’s horse power is a lesson to today’s petrostates: Power based on a strategic commodity is fleeting
item.description: Not so long ago, Afghanistan was the Saudi Arabia of horses. But technological change led to its rapid decline.
